meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Venezuela.
meanings.sent1: In Venezuela, people use bolivars to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged dollars for bolivars at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat filled with bolivars!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a million bolivars.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bolivars jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A sum of money in Venezuelan currency.
meanings.sent1: She saved up all her bolivars to buy a new phone.
meanings.sent2: The total cost came to 500 bolivars.
meanings.sent3: He found a jar filled with old bolivars hidden in the attic.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was worth more than all the bolivars in the world.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the bolivars in his wallet made it bulge.

meanings.sent1: When traveling to Venezuela, make sure to have enough bolivars.
meanings.sent2: The exchange rate for dollars to bolivars is high.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's treasure chest was overflowing with shiny bolivars.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like bolivars, valuable and treasured.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly printed bolivars filled the air in the bank.
